collection.name: NFT Worlds
collection.description:
**NFT Worlds is the most capable & flexible metaverse platform.**

**[NFT Worlds Genesis Avatars Are Minting Now! (Click Here To Mint)](https://nftworlds.com/avatars-mint)**

**[90% of NFT Worlds are staked as of 5/5/22 - True owner count is 4,700+](https://etherscan.io/token/0xBD4455dA5929D5639EE098ABFaa3241e9ae111Af#balances)**

Each NFT World is an explorable, limitless world that can be built into anything you can imagine.

NFT Worlds are massively multiplayer, have extensive developer APIs, are decentralized, and more.

[nftworlds.com](https://nftworlds.com/) • [Docs](https://docs.nftworlds.com/) • [Whitepaper](https://docs.nftworlds.com/nft-worlds-deep-dives/the-vision)       
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nftworldsnft) • [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/AEVWVPeeG3)

[View Our Roadmap](https://docs.nftworlds.com/nft-worlds-other/roadmap)
